subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Montreal Canadiens acquired forward Robert Lang from the Chicago Blackhawks for a second-round pick in 2010. The 37-year-old Lang, set to make $4 million in the final season of his contract, had 21 goals and 54 points in 76 games for Chicago last season.
